class.name: InputEventPanGesture
class.description: Stores information about pan gestures. A pan gesture is performed when the user swipes the touch screen with two fingers. It's typically used for panning/scrolling. [b]Note:[/b] On Android, this requires the [member ProjectSettings.input_devices/pointing/android/enable_pan_and_scale_gestures] project setting to be enabled.

members.member: Panning amount since last pan event.
